name: AlCu
note: This file currently is focused on quantities for eutectic microstructure prediction in binary alloys.

solidus_eutectic_temperature.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.

Cu.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.
